name: Smashy Cars.io Multiplayer
description:
Jump in your CAR and SPEED, SMASH and CRASH your way to victory! Non-stop HIGH OCTANE RACING ACTION, in the new AWESOME BLOCKY quality game from AceViral!

- Colorful HD graphics!
- Over 75 FAST cars to choose from!
- SECRET hidden cars to unlock!
- Lots of MAPS to RACE around!
- FAST intense gameplay!

Will you choose a POLICE RIOT van, ARMY truck or even a ROCKET car on your road to victory! Become the MOST WANTED as you compete online against the world in this MULTIPLAYER driving sensation. Gather your friends and start double crossing them on your road to being NUMBER ONE!

Can't get enough of Smashy Cars? Bugs causing problems? Then we want to hear from you! Click the feedback button in the options menu and drop the Smashy Cars team a message!
